paper.title: Developing probabilistic well construction estimates using regression analysis
paper.abstract: This paper proposes regression analysis as an appropriate method to develop probabilistic estimates for well construction cost and schedule estimates. These estimates are of sufficient quality for use in portfolio management decisions, lease sales, property valuations, project feasibility studies, and in the early stages of concept selection. The paper provides a brief theoretical overview of the method and discusses potential problems encountered in its implementation. A demonstration is provided using recent deepwater drilling data from the Gulf of Mexico.

domain_result.justification: 该论文提出使用回归分析来开发概率性的井建设成本和时间估计，这些估计可用于投资组合管理决策，如租赁销售、财产估值和项目可行性研究。虽然论文涉及风险管理的一些方面，但其主要应用场景明确指向投资组合管理。
